data.title: Where is your location?
data.description: Lenders need to know where you reside and work in to to gauge your viability for the loan

data.title: What is your employment status?
data.description: Lenders need to know your employment status to determine how likely you are to repay a loan.

data.title: What is your income range?
data.description: Lenders need to know how much you earn before you apply for a loan. This will help them get you a comfortable repayment period at the best rates

data.title: How much do you intend to loan?
data.description: Give us an idea of how much you might need to take as a loan in the near future

data.title: Loan Amount
data.description: How much do you need to loan?

data.title: What mode of identity do you poses?
data.description: Lenders need to know what mode of identity you poses for KYC purposes.

rules.message: Please select your mode of identity
